subtitle: A very simple-to-make casserole.

method.text: Heat oil in a large pan. Fry onion for 3 min. Coat chicken portions in flour. Add chicken to pan and brown on both sides. Pour over the tomatoes.
Fill the empty tomato can with water and pour into the pan. Stir in herbs and season. Cover and simmer for 30 min, adding a little extra boiling water if it simmers too rapidly. Serve.
